snippet: Raffaele Sollecito is using an alleged confession by Amanda Knox to argue he is innocent of killing a student in Italy in 2007.
abstract: Raffaele Sollecito, co-defendant with his former girlfriend Amanda Knox in 2007 murder of British student Meredith Kercher in Italy, announces new appeal strategy that separates his defense from Knox's; says statement by Knox exonerates him and provides an alibi.
lead_paragraph: Raffaele Sollecito is using an alleged confession by Amanda Knox to argue he is innocent of killing a student in Italy in 2007.

headline.print_headline: Italy: Knox and Former Boyfriend Diverge on Appeals Defense
